page.title: 15LOWDHAM VILLAGE HALL.
page.content: The new village hall was built about five years ago,almost on the site of the previous hall which had to be demolished. It's situated just off Main Street near the Post Office and opposite The Ship Public House. Inside the hall there is a large room which is used for parties,discos and coffee mornings.It is also used by the local playgroup.There is also a small room,a kitchen and toilets. Outside,at the back of the hall,there are some swings and an area where children practise on their B.M.X. bikes.
